Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class BaseObject

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BaseObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chest, Enemy, Item, Terrain
public abstract class BaseObject
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract structure for enemy, chest and also item objects. Defines only the most basic functions and values, that can be used by extended objects.

    • selectObject

      public abstract void selectObject​(MapCreatorWindow mcWindow)
      Selects the object. To let the user know something is selected, stroke of the selected object is yellow instead of black.
      Parameters:
      mcWindow - pointer to MapCreatorWindow

    • selectObject

    • reselectObject

      public void reselectObject​(MapCreatorWindow mcWindow)

      Parameters:
      mcWindow - pointer to MapCreatorWindow
